description: For the assessment of three existing loading docks at the Saskatchewan Penitentiary. The contract is requesting the services of an architectural firm acting as the Prime Consultant with a multi-disciplinary team of sub-consultants.  The facilities assessed will be at buildings C33, F25 and B11, and the architectural firm will provide a comprehensive assessment of the loading docks, including the assessment of electrical, plumbing, and refrigeration systems.

full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Project Name and Title**
=========================

Loading Docks Assessment and Repair, Prince Albert, Saskatchewan

**Solicitation Information**
-------------------------

* **RFx Number**: WS3765771658
* **Document Number**: Doc3968972724
* **Posting Date**: April 20, 2023
* **Bid Closing Date and Time**: May 16, 2023 at 14:00 HAE (Eastern Standard Time)

**Tender Description**
-------------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Correctional Service Canada (CSC) requires the services of an architectural firm acting as the Prime Consultant with a multi-disciplinary team of sub-consultants for the assessment of three existing loading docks at buildings C33, F25 and B11 within the Saskatchewan Penitentiary (SaskPen). This project cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number WS3765771658 (Doc3765856251) dated December 15, 2022 with a closing of January 31, 2023.

** 솔*Procurement Details**
------------------------

### Unspsc
81100000 - Professional engineering services

### Procurement Category
SRV

### Tender Type
Request for Proposal

### Selection Criteria
Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Contract Details
---------------------

The expected contract start date is February 6, 2023, and the expected contract end date is January 31, 2024.

**Eligible Entities**
-------------------

Canadian businesses and individuals.

**Trade Agreements**
-----------------

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Regions of Delivery**
---------------------

* Prince Albert, Saskatchewan

**Contracting Entity**
-------------------

* Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* Contact Person: Hector Ho, Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Phone: None, Email: [hector.ho@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:hector.ho@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca), Fax: None

**Additional Information**
----------------------

* All bids must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery.
* Debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.

[View the official posting on CPAM](http://discovery.ar
